{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":245452,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは薙刀の先につけられた刀身。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was the blade attached to the tip of a naginata."},{"lineNumber":245453,"originalJapaneseLine":"明かりを身に受けた刀身が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The blade, bathed in light,"},{"lineNumber":245454,"originalJapaneseLine":"まるで月のように、","translatedEnglishLine":"shone like the moon,"},{"lineNumber":245455,"originalJapaneseLine":"闇の中にあって光輝いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"radiating brightly in the darkness."},{"lineNumber":245456,"originalJapaneseLine":"（誰か……いやがる……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Someone... there's resistance...)"},{"lineNumber":245457,"originalJapaneseLine":"闇の奥に武器を構えた何者かがいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"In the depths of the darkness, someone was poised with a weapon."},{"lineNumber":245458,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それよりもう一歩進めば、","translatedEnglishLine":"'...If you take one more step forward,"},{"lineNumber":245459,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はこの薙刀を振り下ろす」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I will swing this naginata down on you.'"},{"lineNumber":245460,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……っ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'...!'"},{"lineNumber":245461,"originalJapaneseLine":"質量を伴った何者かの殺気が、","translatedEnglishLine":"A tangible murderous intent from someone,"},{"lineNumber":245462,"originalJapaneseLine":"マッスルの足を止めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"stopped Muscle in his tracks."},{"lineNumber":245463,"originalJapaneseLine":"（やべ……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Oh no..."},{"lineNumber":245464,"originalJapaneseLine":"　向こうの間合いが分からない以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"Since I don't know their range,"},{"lineNumber":245465,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これもう一歩踏み込んだらマジで……）","translatedEnglishLine":"if I step forward once more, seriously...)"},{"lineNumber":245466,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……警報は聞いた。","translatedEnglishLine":"'...I heard the alarm."},{"lineNumber":245467,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お前達が侵入者のようだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"'It seems you are the intruders.'"},{"lineNumber":245468,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……進むか退くか、選べ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Choose whether to advance or retreat.'"},{"lineNumber":245469,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'............'"},{"lineNumber":245470,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'............'"},{"lineNumber":245471,"originalJapaneseLine":"緊張感からマッスルが唾を飲み込んだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Muscle swallowed hard from the tension."},{"lineNumber":245472,"originalJapaneseLine":"「待って下さい」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Please wait.'"},

{"lineNumber":245473,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"'............'"},

{"lineNumber":245474,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この部屋にはたまたま入っただけ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'We only happened to enter this room by chance."},

{"lineNumber":245475,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無意味な戦いは望みではありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"'We do not desire a senseless battle."},

{"lineNumber":245476,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうか見逃してはもらえませんか」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Please, could you let us go?' "},

{"lineNumber":245477,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……この子達のことを分かっていないのか？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...Do you not understand these children?)"},

{"lineNumber":245478,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王のご子息でしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'You are the king's son, aren't you?'"},

{"lineNumber":245479,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……それを知りながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Knowing that,"},

{"lineNumber":245480,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それが目的ではないと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'you say that is not your purpose?'"},

{"lineNumber":245481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達の望みは勝利ではありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Our desire is not victory.'"},

{"lineNumber":245482,"originalJapaneseLine":"「戦乱の世で、","translatedEnglishLine":"'In a world of war and strife,"},

{"lineNumber":245483,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物が魔物らしく生きる世界の創造」","translatedEnglishLine":"'we seek to create a world where monsters live as true monsters.'"},

{"lineNumber":245484,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それを考えれば……","translatedEnglishLine":"'When you think about that...'"},

{"lineNumber":245485,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この子供は手をかける必要がない」","translatedEnglishLine":"'there is no need to lay a hand on this child.'"},

{"lineNumber":245486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「世が乱れ、戦が増えることは願ってもないこと。","translatedEnglishLine":"'We do not wish for the world to fall into chaos and for wars to increase."},

{"lineNumber":245487,"originalJapaneseLine":"　この子達は……","translatedEnglishLine":"'These children...'"},

{"lineNumber":245488,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いずれ世界を乱す存在になりそうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'seem likely to become entities that will one day disrupt the world.'"},

{"lineNumber":245489,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I see...'"},

{"lineNumber":245490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「話せそうな者が相手で、","translatedEnglishLine":"'It's reassuring that the one I'm dealing with seems willing to talk...'"},

{"lineNumber":245491,"originalJapaneseLine":"　少し安心した……かな」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I'm somewhat relieved... maybe.'"},

{"lineNumber":245492,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、それに気も合いそうだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Heh, and it looks like we might get along too.'"},

{"lineNumber":245493,"originalJapaneseLine":"闇の中から千姫が姿を現す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Chihime appeared from within the darkness."},

{"lineNumber":245494,"originalJapaneseLine":"「悪いな、茶は出せそうにないぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Sorry, I don't think I can offer any tea.'"},

{"lineNumber":245495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いえ、お構いなく。","translatedEnglishLine":"'No, don't worry about it."},

{"lineNumber":245496,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それより夜分遅く、お騒がせして失礼」","translatedEnglishLine":"'More than that, sorry to disturb you so late at night.'"},

{"lineNumber":245497,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いい面構えだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'...You have a fine face.' "},

{"lineNumber":245498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふ、みんな楽しそうで、","translatedEnglishLine":"'Hehe, everyone looks so happy,"},

{"lineNumber":245499,"originalJapaneseLine":"　羨ましいものだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"'it's something to be envious of...'"},

{"lineNumber":245500,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……代わってあげようか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'...Shall I take over for you?'"},

{"lineNumber":245501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「遠慮しておく。","translatedEnglishLine":"'I'll decline."},

{"lineNumber":245502,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私には私のやることがあるからな」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I have my own things to do.'"},

{"lineNumber":245503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やること？」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Things to do?'"},

{"lineNumber":245504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この子達の母さ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'I'm these children's mother.'"},

{"lineNumber":245505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーーい！　敵ならここにいるぞー！","translatedEnglishLine":"'Heyyy! The enemy is right here!'"},

{"lineNumber":245506,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんなー、集まれー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Everyone, come here!'"},

{"lineNumber":245507,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げえっ！　このアマ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Gah! You little brat!'"},

{"lineNumber":245508,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、逃げないとドンドン人が集まるぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"'Now, if you don't run, more and more people will gather."},

{"lineNumber":245509,"originalJapaneseLine":"　無論、私を人質に取るのも手だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Of course, taking me hostage is another option.'"},

{"lineNumber":245510,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私はどちらでもいいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"'Either way is fine with me.'"},

{"lineNumber":245511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ、くそ、逃げるぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"'Ah, damn it, let's run!'"}

]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは薙刀の先につけられた刀身。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was the blade attached to the tip of a naginata.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 明かりを身に受けた刀身が、
まるで月のように、
闇の中にあって光輝いていた。
（誰か……いやがる……）
闇の奥に武器を構えた何者かがいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the depths of the darkness, someone was poised with a weapon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それよりもう一歩進めば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: '...If you take one more step forward,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はこの薙刀を振り下ろす」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I will swing this naginata down on you.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 質量を伴った何者かの殺気が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A tangible murderous intent from someone,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッスルの足を止めていた。
（やべ……
向こうの間合いが分からない以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since I don't know their range,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これもう一歩踏み込んだらマジで……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if I step forward once more, seriously...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……警報は聞いた。
お前達が侵入者のようだな」
「……進むか退くか、選べ」
緊張感からマッスルが唾を飲み込んだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle swallowed hard from the tension.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「待って下さい」
「この部屋にはたまたま入っただけ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'We only happened to enter this room by chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無意味な戦いは望みではありません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'We do not desire a senseless battle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうか見逃してはもらえませんか」
（……この子達のことを分かっていないのか？）
「王のご子息でしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'You are the king's son, aren't you?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……それを知りながら、
それが目的ではないと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'you say that is not your purpose?'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達の望みは勝利ではありません」
「戦乱の世で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'In a world of war and strife,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物が魔物らしく生きる世界の創造」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'we seek to create a world where monsters live as true monsters.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それを考えれば……
この子供は手をかける必要がない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'there is no need to lay a hand on this child.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「世が乱れ、戦が増えることは願ってもないこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'We do not wish for the world to fall into chaos and for wars to increase.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この子達は……
いずれ世界を乱す存在になりそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'seem likely to become entities that will one day disrupt the world.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうか……」
「話せそうな者が相手で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'It's reassuring that the one I'm dealing with seems willing to talk...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少し安心した……かな」
「ふっ、それに気も合いそうだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Heh, and it looks like we might get along too.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 闇の中から千姫が姿を現す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chihime appeared from within the darkness.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「悪いな、茶は出せそうにないぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Sorry, I don't think I can offer any tea.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いえ、お構いなく。
それより夜分遅く、お騒がせして失礼」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'More than that, sorry to disturb you so late at night.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……いい面構えだ」
「ふふ、みんな楽しそうで、
羨ましいものだな……」
「……代わってあげようか？」
「遠慮しておく。
私には私のやることがあるからな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'I have my own things to do.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やること？」
「この子達の母さ」
「おーーい！　敵ならここにいるぞー！
みんなー、集まれー！」
「げえっ！　このアマ！」
「さあ、逃げないとドンドン人が集まるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Now, if you don't run, more and more people will gather.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無論、私を人質に取るのも手だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Of course, taking me hostage is another option.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はどちらでもいいぞ」
「あーっ、くそ、逃げるぞ！

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「さあ、逃げないとドンドン人が集まるぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Now, if you don't run, more and more people will gather.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無論、私を人質に取るのも手だな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Of course, taking me hostage is another option.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私はどちらでもいいぞ」
「あーっ、くそ、逃げるぞ！
